item.title: Help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

This is a fail… every dialogue that it sends you are telling it to send it to the next dialogue…
So once it gets to case 200, whenever it displays that chat you are telling it to send it to the next chat, 201. Use case 40 for this.

Read full topic

item.title: Help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @lolboy396 lolboy396
item.description:
@lolboy396 wrote:

Soz i knew i forget something

if(NPCID == 725){ NpcDialogue = 200; NpcDialogueSend = false; } case 200: talk2("Hello Can you help me", "My Grandson was Playing in the wilderness", 725); NpcDialogueSend = false; NpcDialogue = 201; break; case 201: talk2("He Said Something About a", "King Black Dragon", 725); NpcDialogueSend = false; NpcDialogue = 202; break; case 202: talk2("I Could Take you if you want", "My son was Playing in the wilderness", 725); NpcDialogueSend = false; NpcDialogue = 201; break;

Read full topic

if(NPCID == 725){ NpcDialogue = 200; NpcDialogueSend = false; } case 200: talk2("Hello Can you help me", "My Grandson was Playing in the wilderness", 725); NpcDialogueSend = false; NpcDialogue = 201; break; case 201: talk2("He Said Something About a", "King Black Dragon", 725); NpcDialogueSend = false; NpcDialogue = 202; break; case 202: talk2("I Could Take you if you want", "My son was Playing in the wilderness", 725); NpcDialogueSend = false; NpcDialogue = 201; break;
